Additional JS frameworks description.other: List of comma separated pathes to JS files, which must be loaded BEFORE the main Pydio framework is loaded. The preferred way should be using plugin resources declarations. Loading JS files at the very start up of the page might be option in some cases only.

An additionnal message displayed in the.other: An additional message displayed in the start up screen

Append a title to the image logo.other: Append a title to the image logo

Attributes of the image used as a backgr.other: Attributes of the image used as a background

Browser-based rich interface. Contains c.other: Browser-based rich interface. Contains configurations for theming, custom welcome message, etc.

Enable the small tour triggered at first.other: Enable the small tour triggered at first visit

Font sized used for the title in the sta.other: Font sized used for the title in the start up screen

Height of the custom icon (with the px m.other: Height of the custom icon (with the px mention)

Id of your GA account, something like UE.other: Id of your GA account, something like UE-XXXX-YY

Make sure to use a smaller resolution im.other: Make sure to use a smaller resolution image, otherwise mobile loading is very slow.

Number of MINUTES before the session exp.other: Number of MINUTES before the session expiration for issuing an alert to the user

Override default styles and colors with.other: Override default styles and colors with the options defined in the branding tool. Make sure to reload the interface if you toggle this option.

Replace the logo displayed in the welcom.other: Replace the logo displayed in the welcome page

Replace the top left logo in the top too.other: Replace the top left logo in the top toolbar

Set the domain for your analytics report.other: Set the domain for your analytics reports (not mandatory!)

Set the domain for yuor analytics report.other: Set the domain for your analytics reports (not mandatory!)

Set up some application parameters. If y.other: Set up some application parameters. If you enable Emails, please use the Test button to check if your php is correctly configured.

Show the palette on the interface to cha.other: Show the palette on the interface to change the interface colors and logos. Make sure to reload the interface if you toggle this option.

Skip the title, only display an image.other: Skip the title, only display an image

The length of the client session in SECO.other: The length of the client session in SECONDS. The server session length will be used by default. In most PHP installations, the session length is set to 1440 seconds (24 minutes). You can set this value to 0. This will make the client session 'infinite' by pinging the server periodically. This keeps the PHP session alive. For evident security reasons, this is not a recommended setting.

Top-right logo displayed on minisite pag.other: Logótipo superior direito exibido na página de mini-site

URI to a custom image to be used as star.other: URI to a custom image to be used as start up logo

Use Events Logging, experimental only im.other: Use Events Logging, experimental only implemented on download action in Pydio

For security, disconnect user if there w.other: For security, disconnect user if there was no activity. Set to the cookie expiration by default.

Alert the user that the web session is a.other: Alert the user that the web session is about to expire. Number of minutes before session expiration

Custom HTML you want to be included in t.other: Custom HTML you want to be included in the pages header. Beware, make sure to put valid HTML here!
